doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes Lothar Baumgarten Imago Mundi (2004) at Marian Goodman; Dan Colen Miracle Paintings (2014) at Gagosian; Anselm Kiefer hortus philosophorum (2009) and Next Year in Jerusalem (2010) at Gagosian; Ryan McGinness Figure Drawings (2014) at Pace Prints; Philip Pearlstein (2004) at Robert Miller; Giuseppe Penone (2012) at Gagosian; Robert Rauschenberg Works on Metal (2014) at Gagosian; Edward Ruscha Anamorphic Paintings (1995) at Leo Castelli; Richard Serra (2009) at Gagosian; Francesco Vezzoli The Gore Vidal Trilogy (2006); Adrian Villar Rojas Two Suns (2015) at Marian Goodman; Lawrence Weiner En Route (2005), At the Level of the Sea (2009), and Gyroscopically Speaking (2011) at Marian Goodman.
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> Oversize (3 of 3 folders)
